Bio

I am a tenure-track assistant professor with Department of Computer Science, Aalborg University, Denmark. I am a member of Data Engineering, Science and Systems (DESS) group. I recieved the Ph.D. degree from Aalborg University, Denmark, in 2022, under the supervision of Prof. Christian S. Jensen, Prof. Lu Chen, and Prof. Torben Bach Pedersen. I won several awards including ICDE 2022 Best Paper, NDBC 2022 One of the Best Papers, and ICCSIE 2022 Best Paper. I have served on the Program Committees of top conferences including ICDE, KDD, AAAI, etc, and as a reviewer of prestigious journals including VLDBJ, TKDE, TNSE, etc.

Research Interests

My primary research areas are Big Data Management and Database. Specifically, my current research interests are as follows:

  • Spatio-temporal Data Management and Analytics
  • Database
  • Knowledge Graph
  • Data Quality
